statements: SELECT * FROM ar_content_placement;
SELECT interaction_count, ar_content_id FROM ar_content_placement WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT placement_location FROM ar_content_placement WHERE interaction_count > 100;
SELECT user_id, last_interaction_at FROM ar_content_placement WHERE last_interaction_at > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT ar_content_id, user_id, placement_location FROM ar_content_placement ORDER BY last_interaction_at DESC, interaction_count ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ar_content_placement WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY interaction_count DESC, last_interaction_at ASC;
SELECT ar_content_id, placement_location, interaction_count FROM ar_content_placement WHERE last_interaction_at > '2021-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY placement_location;
SELECT user_id, placement_location, interaction_count, last_interaction_at FROM ar_content_placement WHERE interaction_count BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY user_id, last_interaction_at DESC;
SELECT ar_content_id, interaction_count FROM ar_content_placement WHERE user_id = '98765432-12ab-34cd-56ef-123456789abc' AND placement_location = 'sidebar' ORDER BY interaction_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(ar_content_id) AS content_count FROM ar_content_placement GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(ar_content_id) > 2 ORDER BY content_count DESC, user_id;
SELECT * FROM AR_Content_Placement;
SELECT user_id, interaction_timestamp, content_id FROM AR_Content_Placement ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM AR_Content_Placement WHERE interaction_timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM User_Profile WHERE last_interaction_timestamp IS NOT NULL;
SELECT content_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM AR_Content_Placement WHERE user_id = 12345 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, content_id, user_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM AR_Content_Placement WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM User_Profile WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';

SELECT user_id, username, email, last_interaction_timestamp FROM User_Profile WHERE last_interaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-06-30 23:59:59' ORDER BY last_interaction_timestamp ASC LIMIT 50;
SELECT content_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM AR_Content_Placement GROUP BY content_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 100 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM AR_Content_Placement GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_interactions DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ar_placement ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT content_name, creation_timestamp FROM ar_content WHERE id = 3;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interaction WHERE interaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND interaction_timestamp <= '2022-02-01';
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM user_interaction;
SELECT ar_placement.id, ar_content.content_name, user_id FROM ar_placement JOIN ar_content ON ar_placement.ar_content_id = ar_content.id WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT id, ar_content_id, user_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM ar_placement WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM ar_content WHERE id = 5;
SELECT content_name, content_description FROM ar_content WHERE creation_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_interaction WHERE ar_content_id IN (SELECT id FROM ar_content WHERE content_name LIKE '%virtual%');
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM user_interaction GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY interaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Placement;
SELECT ar_name, ar_description FROM ARContent WHERE ar_type = 'Image';
SELECT user_id, ar_name FROM Placement INNER JOIN ARContent ON Placement.ar_content_id = ARContent.ar_content_id;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, log_details->'interaction_details' AS interaction_details FROM InteractionLogs;
SELECT * FROM Placement ORDER BY placement_timestamp DESC, placement_id ASC;
SELECT ar_name, ar_description FROM ARContent WHERE ar_type = 'Image' LIMIT 5;
SELECT u.user_id, u.ar_content_id, i.interaction_type, i.interaction_timestamp FROM UserInteractions u INNER JOIN InteractionLogs l ON u.interaction_id = l.interaction_id WHERE u.user_id = 123;

SELECT ar_name, ar_description, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM ARContent c INNER JOIN UserInteractions u ON c.ar_content_id = u.ar_content_id GROUP BY ar_name, ar_description ORDER BY interaction_count DESC;

SELECT p.placement_id, a.ar_name, u.interaction_type, l.log_details->>'status' AS interaction_status FROM Placement p JOIN ARContent a ON p.ar_content_id = a.ar_content_id JOIN UserInteractions u ON p.user_id = u.user_id JOIN InteractionLogs l ON u.interaction_id = l.interaction_id WHERE u.interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT * FROM ar_content_placement;
SELECT placement_id, content_id, user_id FROM ar_content_placement;
SELECT content_name, content_type, content_size FROM content_details WHERE content_type = 'video';
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_history ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM ar_content_placement WHERE placement_id = 1;
SELECT content_name, content_type FROM content_details WHERE content_size > 100;
SELECT user_id, count(*) as total_interactions FROM user_interaction GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT preference_1, preference_2, preference_3 FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, content_id, interaction_type FROM user_history ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
